---
title: "hiv_data_cleaning"
author: "Jake Epstein"
date: "9/19/2019"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)

hiv = read.csv("hiv_data.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
hiv = hiv %>%
  select(-X)


for (j in 4:length(hiv)){
  for (i in 1:nrow(hiv)){
    entry = hiv[i,j]
    if (entry == "..."){
      hiv[i,j] = NA
      next
    }
    if (str_count(entry, "<") != 0) {
      hiv[i, j] = 0
    }
    else {
      hiv[i,j] = as.numeric(entry)
    }
  }
}

hiv = hiv %>%
  filter(Country.Code != "")

write.csv(hiv, file = "hiv.csv")
```
